snippet: The nation’s biggest miners’ union and Patriot Coal have reached a potential settlement that the union claimed eases the severity of wage and benefits cuts a bankruptcy judge had allowed the company to impose.
abstract: United Mine Workers of America, nation's biggest miners' union, and Patriot Coal reach potential settlement that the union claims eases the severity of wage and benefits cuts a bankruptcy judge had allowed the company to impose.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s biggest miners’ union and Patriot Coal have reached a potential settlement that the union claimed eases the severity of wage and benefits cuts a bankruptcy judge had allowed the company to impose.

headline.main: Patriot Coal and Union Reach a Deal on Cutbacks
headline.print_headline: Patriot Coal And Union Reach a Deal On Cutbacks
